Providing the industry-leading solution you need
Finding the right residential waste and recycling solution provider is an important decision. At TheKleaners, we reward the decision by providing a wide range of exceptional services and products.
The Kleaners offers peace of
Our reliable services protect the environment while allowing your home or business to run like clockwork.

Battery and lightbulb recycling can seem complicated on the surface. Our Recycle-By-Mail program provide simple, safe ways to recycle.
Disposing of medical waste properly is a huge concern for all communities,large and small. For simple,convenient product to help you safely dcaispose of used syringes and lancets. Trust TheKleaners.
If you prefer disposal option only, we can help:

-Medical waste
 -Biohazardous waste
 -Pharmaceutical waste
 -Pathological waste
 -Chemotherapy waste
 -Non-hazardous pharmaceutical waste
 -Hazardous waste
These items include waste pickup yard & food, organic waste and more. The at Your Door Special collection program can easily collect these items at your home.
Acceptable items for Food & Organic Waste Recycling can include:

-Fruits and vegetables
 -Meat,poultry,seafood(bones and shells)
 -Bakery items and ingredient
 -Eggs and paper egg cartons
 -Plants,cut flower, potting soil
 -Coffee grounds, filters, tea bags
 -Paper product(napkin,paper towels)
 -Ice cream,yogurt,cottage cheese

Plastics are effectively being recycled at a rate of 2.4 billion pounds per year in INDIA. Doing so helps conserve fossil resources and saves landfill space. Plastic bottles are shred into flakes used for filling in sleeping bags, fleece jacket, carpet and insulation, while jugs and tubs and readily recyclable into new laundry detergent bottles, pens, picnic tables, fencing, and recycling containers.
Metals:
Approximately half of all soda cans,food cans and other aluminum products are recycled each year in the INDIA. The environmental and economic impact of these actions are enormous.
Generally accepted items include:

-Tin cans
 -Aluminum cans
 -Steel cans
Paper/Cardboard
Paper products make up 71 million tons of the muncipal waste stream of INDIA Of thet amount ,upwards of 63 percent(45 million tons) is recycled annually.
Generally accepted items include:

-Office paper
 -Magazines
 -Flattened cardboard
 -Newspaper
 -Phonebooks
 -Flattened cereal boxes
 -Junk mail
 -Paperboard
 -Flattened snack boxes
Glass
Glass make up a large component of household due to its weight and density. Every metric ton of glass recycled save nearly 700 pounds of carbon dioxide from being released into the atmosphere.
Generally accepted items include:

-Food container and jars
 -Soft drinks and beer bottles
 -Wine and liquor bottles

Construction waste is any material on a jobsite from leftover rebar to roofing shingles. These materials, and any others used, require special handling to properly dispose of them. If it's used in building, manufacture, or anything in between, TheKleaners is here to help you find the best way to dispose of it.

Car wash service at your doorstep!

Have a weekend plans ever been wrecked due to critical last-minute trip to car wash, followed by needless delay with unreasonable excuses? Well, with the doorstep introduce by TheKleaners. Periodic check-up are as important to your car, as duty-free breaks.
TheKleaners works with communities like yours to create a safe,sustainable environment. Our trucks and people are on your streets every day, working to keep your community clean.
